# MarketplaceV3Offers.getAllValid() method

Get all valid offers

## Example

```javascript
const offers = await contract.offers.getAllValid();
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAllValid(filter?: MarketplaceFilter): Promise<OfferV3[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                            | Description                             |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| filter    | [MarketplaceFilter](./sdk.marketplacefilter.md) | _(Optional)_ optional filter parameters |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[OfferV3](./sdk.offerv3.md)\[\]&gt;

the Offer object array
